remarks: Rotate lattice join of 3 classes.  Frequently-used special case of ~ latjrot for atoms.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-2012.)
statement:
hlatjcom.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
hlatjcom.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
hlatjrot $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ R e. A ) ) -> ( ( P .\/ Q ) .\/ R ) = ( ( R .\/ P ) .\/ Q ) ) $.
